keyPolicies.policyDescription: Defend the NHS and reverse privatisation, integrate NHS with Social Care.
A National Education Service, like the NHS, with free adult education.
Ban zero hours contracts, raise minimum wage to £10 an hour, repeal Trade Union Act.
Invest in infrastructure, manufacturing & new industries.
Build 1 million homes, at least half council houses.
Fast track a low carbon economy, ban fracking.

issues.brexitEurope: Supports reformed EU to protect workers, environment & stop race-to-the-bottom tax cuts.
issues.economy: Oppose failed austerity causing rising child poverty/homelessness.
issues.education: Free school meals for all primary school children.
issues.governance: Defend Human Rights Act; introduce proportional representation; abolish House of Lords.
issues.immigration: Fair immigration system controlled by Parliament, not free market.
issues.socialWelfare: End sanctions regime and Work Capability Assessment.

housing.content: Tackle our housing crisis by building more council houses.

leaflet.personalStatement: Chris is honest and principled and since being elected in 2010 has fought tirelessly for Derby North.

images.caption: Chris with local residents and supporters
